name: Galacards
description:
Summary:

A space tournament where you will face random opponents around the galaxy !

Attain the highest points and claim to be the king at Galacards !

Controls:

Press Escape for Options

Press Space for End Turn/Finish Round/Draw Card

Hold Shift to Look at "Hidden/Secret" Deck

Made By:
